results.prompt:
You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

PROBLEM:
(define (problem spanner-s3-n2-l5-s1172103266)
 (:domain spanner)
 (:objects 
     bob - man
     spanner1 spanner2 spanner3 - spanner
     nut1 nut2 - nut
     location1 location2 location3 location4 location5 - location
     shed gate - location
    )
 (:init 
    (at bob shed)
    (at spanner1 location1)
    (useable spanner1)
    (at spanner2 location1)
    (useable spanner2)
    (at spanner3 location2)
    (useable spanner3)
    (loose nut1)
    (at nut1 gate)
    (loose nut2)
    (at nut2 gate)
    (link shed location1)
    (link location5 gate)
    (link location1 location2)
    (link location2 location3)
    (link location3 location4)
    (link location4 location5)
)
 (:goal
  (and
   (tightened nut1)
   (tightened nut2)
))
(:constraints
  (and
    (always (imply (not (tightened nut1)) (not (tightened nut2))))
    (forall (?m - man) (at-most-once (at ?m shed)))
  )
)
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

PROBLEM:

 (:domain spanner)

     bob - man
     spanner1 spanner2 spanner3 spanner4 - spanner
     nut1 nut2 nut3 - nut
     location1 location2 location3 location4 location5 - location
     shed gate - location
    )

    (at spanner1 location4)
    (useable spanner1)

    (at spanner3 location3)
    (useable spanner3)

    (at nut3 gate)
    (link shed location1)
    (link location5 gate)
    (link location1 location2)
    (link location2 location3)
    (link location3 location4)
    (link location4 location5)
)

  (and
   (tightened nut1)

))
(:constraints
  (and
    (always (imply (not (tightened nut2)) (not (tightened nut3))))
    (forall (?m - man) (at-most-once (at ?m shed)))
  )
)
)

(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object

)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

(define (domain spanner)

(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

)

	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))

        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)

			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)

You are a PDDL planning expert. Solve the following problem based on the provided domain.

DOMAIN:
(define (domain spanner)                    
(:requirements :typing :strips :constraints)      

(:types 
	location locatable - object
	man nut spanner - locatable	
)                                           
                                                                               
(:predicates 
	(at ?m - locatable ?l - location)
	(carrying ?m - man ?s - spanner)
	(useable ?s - spanner)
	(link ?l1 - location ?l2 - location)
	(tightened ?n - nut)
	(loose ?n - nut))                                                                                           
(:action walk 
        :parameters (?start - location ?end - location ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?start) 
                           (link ?start ?end))                                                          
        :effect (and (not (at ?m ?start)) (at ?m ?end)))

(:action pickup_spanner 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
                           (at ?s ?l))
        :effect (and (not (at ?s ?l))
                     (carrying ?m ?s)))

(:action tighten_nut 
        :parameters (?l - location ?s - spanner ?m - man ?n - nut)
        :precondition (and (at ?m ?l) 
		      	   (at ?n ?l)
			   (carrying ?m ?s)
			   (useable ?s)
			   (loose ?n))
        :effect (and (not (loose ?n))(not (useable ?s)) (tightened ?n)))
)
